general.gigTitle: be your full stack web developer using node js and react js

sellerCard.description: I have been working for 4 years as a Full-Stack Web Developer. I have done a lot of Full-Stack Web Development projects in my university and for manual clients. All the websites I created are historical and the buyers recommend others to contact me if they need a website. So, don't hesitate and contact me so that we may discuss more.

description.content:
Hi! I'm Ali Hamza, a highly creative Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of experience in Next JS web development, backend web development, frontend web development, and MERN stack Web development.


Here I would like to develop your full stack website using MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJs, ReactJs and NodeJs) stack technologies. And will also provide services of web development using Next JS.


Services which I'm providing:

  1. Single Page Applications (SPAs) with React/ReactJs and ReduxJs
  2. Custom web app development, CRUD apps
  3. Backend development with Nodejs, JWT authentication, APIs, and Google OAuth
  4. Restful API
  5. Bug Fixes in Nodejs and ReactJs
  6. API Integration
  7. Cross-browser compatibility
  8. Responsive Design


My Technical Skills:

Front-end Development:

  1.  React JS
  2.  Next JS
  3.  Redux
  4.  HTML5
  5.  CSS3
  6.  Bootstrap
  7. Tailwind CSS


Back-end Development:

  •  Node JS
  •  Express JS
  •  REST API
  • Axios


DataBases:

  •  MongoDB
  •  MySQL


Deployment:

  • Heroku
  • AWS
  • Github
  • Netlify


ï»¿I Would love to discuss your project with you in more detail. Send me a message now to get started.

reviews.comment: Outstanding experience! We encountered some technical issues, but the freelancer was incredibly patient and worked through them efficiently. He not only resolved the problems but also took the time to explain everything clearly. Highly professional, knowledgeable, and great to work with. Highly recommended!
look forward to long term work
very good at his work and very fast!
Nice job on building react js app
